text: This is a tracking bug.  As this is my tracking bug, I will unilaterally remove and add bugs at [my own] will; please, do not replace bugs I have deliberately removed without clearing it with me personally.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
philipp@redfish-solutions.com
text:
Adding:

add IP TOS support to apr_socket_opt_set()
Add global server option for specifying desired DSCP/QoS markings
Set QoS bits via APR2 API instead

It's a diffserv-a-palooza!

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text: Dropping 49866 - anyone can touch this issue, not specific to me.
